fulltext:
THANH DOAN 
PERSONAL DETAILS 
 Name  
Doan Minh Thanh 
 Gender 
Male 
 Email  
 Phone  
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
 8 years of Experience in .NET and Web Application development.  
 Good Knowledge and Experience in C# .NET, ASP.NET, ADO.NET, SQL Server, AJAX, XML, 
JSON, MVC, Javascript, jQuery, Entity Framework. 
 Experience in writing Database objects (Stored Procedures, Functions). 
 Experience in writing SQL queries. 
 Experience in  SharePoint Administrator and SharePoint Powershell Scripting. 
 Experience in  SharePoint Development via .Net Visual Studio. 
 Ability to work as a team member or as an individual and confident in serving the best 
results 
 Possess good verbal and written communication skills. 
 Excellent analytical, problem solving, technical, interpersonal, and communication skills. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
 Web Technologies: ASP.NET, JavaScript, HTML5, MVC, SharePoint 
 Development, Design Tools: Visual Studio,PhotoShop,Turtoise SVN, TFS. 
 Databases: MS SQL Server, Oracle 
 Operating Systems: Windows 7/2008 Server 
 Other: OOP, Three Layers, Apose, XML, AJAX, Design Patterns. 
OTHER SKILLS/QUALITIES 
Foreign Languages 
 English: Upper-intermediate level. 
Personal Qualities 
 Good problem solving and troubleshooting skills. 
 Good in managing things.  
 Unmatchable communication skills in written and verbal both. 
 Ability to produce best result in pressure situation. 
 Skill to work in a team and independently. 
 Ability to grasp and learn quickly new technologies. 
 Good at self-studying skill. 
Doan Minh Thanh’s CV - Confidential 
1 
EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND 
 BACHELOR OF GEOGRAPHIC INFORMATION SYSTEM – Nong Lam University – 2011 – HCM 
City 
 Microsoft 70-480 Certificate 
EMPLOYMENT HISTORY 
Period 
Company 
Job Title 
Aug 2015 – Present 
FPT Software 
Full-Stack Developer 
Aug 2014 – Aug 2015 
FPT IS GMC 
ASP.NET Developer 
2012 –  Aug 2014 
Viet An Environment JSC 
Software Engineer 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
Mar 2017 - Present 
Project: Financial Company New App Generation 
Project Description: 
 Develop new system that using lastest Web technology base on .NET Core for Server 
Side, Angular for Client Side. Hosted by AWS services. 
 Develop automate business workflow using lastest SharePoint online features, 
Office365 data. 
 Develop automate BI tool to report the financial data using Tableu server. 
 Project focus on business related to Financial field, just as Stock, Share etc… 
Project Size: 12 persons. 
Technologies Used: Microsoft SharePoint Online Office365, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Visual Studio, .NET 
4.6, Microsoft SharePoint Designer, .NET Core, Angular, Tableu Server, AWS Services . 
Responsibilities:  
 
Develop, Coding Layout and Function & Unit Testing, Create JavaScript scripts.  
Nov 2016 – Mar 2017 
Project: Dupont Application Migration 
Project Description: 
 Analyze the existing system which build on Lotus Note, then migrate to Microsoft 
Office 365, via customization Javascript,SharePoint Workfow.  
 Project expand on a lot of field, make existing application become more modern, more 
friendly. Become an collaboration environment of Dupont company world wide. 
Project Size: 10 persons. 
Technologies Used: Microsoft SharePoint Online Office365, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Visual Studio, .NET 
4.5, Microsoft SharePoint Designer. 
Responsibilities:  
 
Develop, Coding Layout and Function & Unit Testing, Create JavaScript scripts.  
Doan Minh Thanh’s CV - Confidential 
2 
Sep 2016 –  Nov 2016 
Project: VMR SP Portal 
Project Description: 
 The Vendor Management Request SharePoint System (VMR) is the central platform 
where the IT domains of RWE Supply & Trading can raise requests for any IT 
requirements where something needs to be purchased. This is the basis for any further 
conversations with RWE IT or Procurement and later on for a purchase order (PO). A 
request  is for the Vendor Management to start with their work/ the next steps.  
 The  Vendor Manager organizes and controls his/her requests on this page and puts 
comments about the current status in.  
 In addition the SharePoint represents an archive for all project documents, process 
descriptions and conversations between the domain, Vendor Management, 
Procurement, RWE IT Suppliers budget and financial approvers. It is also possible to 
create different reports on this SharePoint. 
Project Size: 5 persons. 
Technologies Used: Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Visual Studio, .NET 4.5, 
Microsoft SharePoint Designer. 
Responsibilities:  
 
Develop, Coding & Unit Testing, Create PowerShell Script.  
May 2016 – Sep 2016 
Project: Structural Integrity Compliance System (SICS) 
Project Description: 
 
Structural Integrity Compliance System (SICS) is an integrity management tool, used for the 
management of underwater assets. The system incorporates customized reporting, existing 
database integration, and simple administration. It also integrate with others external system 
to generate report and program and compile inspection program report. 
Project Size: 9 persons. 
Technologies Used: Microsoft ASP.NET MVC, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Visual Studio, .NET 4.5 
Responsibilities:   
 
Develop, Coding & Unit Testing and intergrated module.  
Mar 2016 – May 2016 
Project: TISS – Tool Info Suite Service  
Project Description: 
 Provide Services, friendly API, centralize data  for another Applications of Halliburton 
to get Technical Model Files, and Metadata of Tools from Enovia and AMS. 
Project size: 10 persons. 
Technologies Used: WPF, C#, WCF, MS SQL Database, Caliburn, SolidWorks, MSBuild 
Responsibilities:  
 Develop Web Service, maintain and implement User Stories. 
Doan Minh Thanh’s CV - Confidential 
3 
Jan 2016 – Mar 2016 
Project: TEMS – HCT Equipment Maintenance  
Project Description: 
 Application to manage oil and gas equipment maintenance process, help user perform 
equipment maintenance throught documents system. 
Project size: 10 persons. 
Technologies Used: WPF, C#, WCF, MS SQL Database, Caliburn, MEF 
Responsibilities:  
 Develop modules that help Main Application can launch Component through another 
service by URI. 
 Develop Web Service, design UI to fulfil customer User Stories. 
 Maintain Build Process to get update information from Build Definition that run on TFS 
Build Agent.  
Oct 2015 – Jan 2016 
Project: SPVB (Suntory Pepsico Vietnam Beverage) Promotions And Migration SharePoint 
Project  
Project Description:  
 
SPVB website is as integrated solution comprises of the LDMS website, MTO team sites, 
Promotions website. This shall help SPVB users easily to manage and share the documents and 
reports either internally or externally without having issues in the security and sensitivity. 
LDMS currently have 8 workflow process , Promotions have 5 workflow process, which 
involved a lot of documents and reports to be analyze before it will produce a set of final 
documents called as “LDMS Contracts” and currently it is manage in multiple database or 
location. Thus, the key value expected from this system is for it to take over document 
management, and optimizing the value SPVB can provide in its deliverables. 
 
Promotions (Promotions Documents Management System) is a child of LDMS (Leagal 
Document Management System). 
 
Managing the documents URL from the SharePoint list 
 
Site Collection Administrator need to maintain URL in SharePoint list when there are changes 
in term of document location 
 
Users are able to mouse-over to the bricks in the IPOCS WebPart, and click on the bricks 
 
URL will redirect to the specified document library, folders, or documents. 
 
Managing content types, metadata and taxonomy, metadata navigation and filter by some 
conditions 
 
Migrate existing system (including Customizations) on SharePoint Server 2010 to new 
Production Server on SharePoint Server 2013, keep all data and function as SharePoint 
Server 2010. 
Project Size: 15 persons. 
Technologies Used: Microsoft SharePoint Server 2013, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Visual Studio, .NET 4.5 
Responsibilities:  
 
Develop, Coding & Unit Testing, Migrate Module and Data via PowerShell Script.  
Doan Minh Thanh’s CV - Confidential 
4 
Aug 2015 – Oct 2015 
Project: TSS - Andromeda -  Equipment Maintenance  
Project Description: 
 Application to manage oil and gas equipment maintenance process, help user perform 
equipment maintenance throught documents system. 
Project size: 10 persons. 
Technologies Used: WPF, C#, WCF, MS SQL Database, Caliburn, MEF 
Responsibilities:  
 Develop, deployment SSIS package for ETL process, pull data from Oracle SAP 
database. 
 Develop Web Service, design UI to fullfil customer User Stories. 
 Manual test, develop change request from new customer’s requirement.  
Aug 2014 – Aug 2015 
Project: Quang Ninh e-Government System 
Project Description: 
 
An system that serve citizen to register and administrative work 
Project size: 100 persons. 
Technologies Used: ASP.NET Web Forms, C#, WCF, MS SQL Database, OpenLayer 
Responsibilities:  
 Develop Store Procedure, coding Web Service, design GUI, base on URD and DDD 
documents. 
 Integrate System, manual test, develop change request from new customer’s 
requirement.  
 Research and develop Open Source Web GIS (Mapping) for Land Management Module.  
Jan 2012 – Aug 2014 
Project: Water Distribution Management System 
Project Description: 
 
An system that help user to manage the current Water Pipe Network, simulating the behaviors 
of the real system on this model. 
Project size: 10 persons. 
Technologies Used: .NET Windows Forms, C#, MS SQL Database, Oracle, Geodatabase, ArcGIS 
Engine 
Responsibilities:  
 Gathered business requirements, provided database architecture and design prototype  
 Develop water distribution management and modeling system base on ESRI 
Technology, integrated with Bentley WaterGEMS, perform manual testing.  
 Writing technical document, user guide.  
 Deploying software, technical supporting, training, maintainment develop new feature 
base on new customer requirements.  
Doan Minh Thanh’s CV - Confidential 
5 
INTERESTS AND ACTIVITIES 
 Web Mapping. 
 Open Source Project/Website 
 Playing volleyball, swimming, traveling, listen to music. 
CAREER OBJECTIVES 
 My current objective is that I will try my best to achieve a Senior Developer position. I 
would like to specialize in developing and training all the solutions for enterprise operation 
and personnel training management used Microsoft or OpenSource technology. 
 To acquire a challenging career with a solid company utilizing the opportunity to offer 
proven and developing skills within the company.  
Doan Minh Thanh’s CV - Confidential 
6

This is the basis for any further conversations with RWE IT or Procurement and later on for a purchase order (PO). A request is for the Vendor Management to start with their work/ the next steps.
The Vendor Manager organizes and controls his/her requests on this page and puts comments about the current status in.
In addition the SharePoint represents an archive for all project documents, process descriptions and conversations between the domain, Vendor Management, Procurement, RWE IT Suppliers budget and financial approvers.
